        public abstract org.openqa.selenium.By getRootElementLocator()
        Returns:

      • isLoaded

        public abstract boolean isLoaded()
        Returns "true" if the Component on the page has loaded. How a component can be considered loaded it's up to the specific component implementation.
        Returns:
        "true" if the Component on the page has loaded.

      • isVisible

        public abstract boolean isVisible()
        Returns "true" if the Component is visible on the page. How a component can be considered visible it's up to the specific component implementation.
        Returns:
        "true" if the Component is visible on the page.

      • getSource

        public java.lang.String getSource()
        Returns:
        HTML Source code of the component (i.e. the DOM subtree as String), if any.
